com.cloudcraftgaming.perworldchatplus.chat

Class ChatMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cloudcraftgaming.perworldchatplus.chat.ChatMessage

  • public class ChatMessage
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Nova Fox on 6/6/2016. Website: www.cloudcraftgaming.com For Project: PerWorldChatPlus. This class is used to set a chat message's content and other related tasks.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      ChatMessage()

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String determineMessageContents(java.lang.String originalMessage, org.bukkit.entity.Player sender)
      Determines the message contents before it is sent based on settings and what the original message contained.
      static java.lang.String filterAds(java.lang.String message, org.bukkit.entity.Player sender)
      Gets a new message that is cleaned of all blocked ads (except for exempt ads) if enabled (Case insensitive).
      static java.lang.String filterSwears(java.lang.String message, org.bukkit.entity.Player sender)
      Gets a new message that is cleaned of all blocked swear/curse words if enabled (Case insensitive).
      static java.lang.String makeMessageColorful(java.lang.String message, org.bukkit.entity.Player sender)
      Prefixes the chat message with the player's default chat color, and if they have permission, will translate color codes in their message.
      static java.lang.String removeGlobalBypassString(java.lang.String message)
      If the chat message contains the Global Override String, it will remove it so that it is not visible in chat.
      static boolean shouldBeGlobal(java.lang.String message, org.bukkit.entity.Player sender)
      Checks if the chat message should be sent globally.
      static boolean wasMentioned(org.bukkit.entity.Player player, java.lang.String message)
      Checks if the player's name was mentioned in the chat message (Only if requirements were met).

        public ChatMessage()

    • Method Detail

      • determineMessageContents

        public static java.lang.String determineMessageContents(java.lang.String originalMessage,
                                        org.bukkit.entity.Player sender)
        Determines the message contents before it is sent based on settings and what the original message contained. This combines all methods for checking what the message should contain. (Used by PerWorldChatPlus's main chat listener).
        Parameters:
        originalMessage - The original message before sending.
        sender - The sender of the chat message.
        Returns:
        a new string message to be sent as the chat message.

      • filterSwears

        public static java.lang.String filterSwears(java.lang.String message,
                            org.bukkit.entity.Player sender)
        Gets a new message that is cleaned of all blocked swear/curse words if enabled (Case insensitive).
        Parameters:
        message - The original message to be sent (unfiltered).
        sender - The sender of the message (to be used if they did swear because an action may be taken).
        Returns:
        A new message that is clean of all blocked swears.

      • filterAds

        public static java.lang.String filterAds(java.lang.String message,
                         org.bukkit.entity.Player sender)
        Gets a new message that is cleaned of all blocked ads (except for exempt ads) if enabled (Case insensitive). This is still in beta so it may not work fully or at all (Sorry).
        Parameters:
        message - The original message to be sent (unfiltered).
        sender - The sender of the message (to be used if they did advertise because action may be taken).
        Returns:
        A new message that is clean of all blocked ads.

      • removeGlobalBypassString

        public static java.lang.String removeGlobalBypassString(java.lang.String message)
        If the chat message contains the Global Override String, it will remove it so that it is not visible in chat.
        Parameters:
        message - The original message to be sent.
        Returns:
        A new message that does not contain the Global Override String.

      • makeMessageColorful

        public static java.lang.String makeMessageColorful(java.lang.String message,
                                   org.bukkit.entity.Player sender)
        Prefixes the chat message with the player's default chat color, and if they have permission, will translate color codes in their message.
        Parameters:
        message - The original message to be sent.
        sender - The sender of the message.
        Returns:
        A new message with colors.

      • shouldBeGlobal

        public static boolean shouldBeGlobal(java.lang.String message,
                     org.bukkit.entity.Player sender)
        Checks if the chat message should be sent globally.
        Parameters:
        message - The chat message to check.
        sender - The sender of the chat message.
        Returns:
        True if the chat message should be global, else false.

      • wasMentioned

        public static boolean wasMentioned(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                   java.lang.String message)
        Checks if the player's name was mentioned in the chat message (Only if requirements were met).
        Parameters:
        player - The player to check.
        message - The message to check.
        Returns:
        True if the player was mentioned in the message, else false.
